menu_v2.Menu¶

class menu_v2.Menu(is_debug=False)¶

This is the class handling all Main Menu displays.

Variables

  • directions – Word directions used for Controls menu

  • debug – Enables printing of debug info and disables time.sleep if True

  • level_list – Array containing all levels_file.in in .|levels|*

  • freedom – Returns set valid characters for each word drection

__init__(is_debug=False)¶

Initializes all of the variables of the Menu instance.

Parameters

is_debug (bool, optional) – Makes debugging more convenient if True, defaults to False

Methods

__init__([is_debug])

Initializes all of the variables of the Menu instance.

main_menu()

This is from where the game handles all of the sub-menus!

Attributes

directions

Egg Roll 2: Electric Boogaloo
